title: Wadada Leo Smith - America's National Parks (2016)
description: Cuneiform Records: RUNE 430/431 http://www.cuneiformrecords.com/bandshtml/smith.html * Wadada Leo Smith: trumpet, director of the ensemble * Anthony Davis : piano * Ashley Walters : cello * John Lindberg : bass * Pheeroan akLaff : drums * Jesse Gilbert : video artist http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Davis_%28composer%29 http://www.ashleywalterscello.com/ http://www.johnlindberg.com/ http://www.pheeroanaklaff.com/ http://www.jessegilbert.net/ Recorded on May 5, 2016 and mixed by Nick Lloyd at Firehouse 12 Recording Studio, New Haven, Connecticut (CT), United States. Reviews ~~~~~~~ By Cormac Larkin http://www.irishtimes.com/culture/music/wadada-leo-smith-america-s-national-parks-album-review-stormy-studies-of-nature-environment-and-ownership-1.2824192 Trumpeter, composer and thought-provoker Wadada Leo Smith likes to blur the lines between composition and improvisation, even inventing his own notation system, Ankhrasmation, to better communicate his intentions. This latest work for his Golden Quintet – trumpet, piano, cello, bass and drums – is a starkly original six-part suite about the US National Parks Service, founded 100 years ago this year. But anyone expecting sweeping cinematic scores summoning the grandeur of nature will be barking up the wrong sequoia. Smith’s turbulent, unsettling compositions, which artfully exploit his group’s unusual instrumental combination, are more about issues of ownership and the future of the planet, which leaves you admiring Smith’s fierce sense of social justice (as well as his darkly ruminative trumpet-playing) and wondering what on earth has happened to all the other protest musicians? -- By Thom Jurek http://www.allmusic.com/album/americas-national-parks-mw0002975978 By Stef http://www.freejazzblog.org/2016/12/wadada-leo-smith-americas-national.html By Derek Taylor By Dan McClenaghan http://www.allaboutjazz.com/wadada-leo-smith-americas-national-parks-wadada-leo-smith-cuneiform-records-review-by-dan-mcclenaghan.php By Karl Ackermann http://www.allaboutjazz.com/americas-national-parks-wadada-leo-smith-cuneiform-records-review-by-karl-ackermann.php By Troy Collins http://www.allaboutjazz.com/americas-national-parks-wadada-leo-smith-cuneiform-records-review-by-troy-collins.php Dionizy Piątkowski (pl) http://jazz.pl/wadada-leo-smith-americas-national-parks-cuneiform-records/ Da Alberto Bazzurro (it) http://www.allaboutjazz.com/americas-national-parks-wadada-leo-smith-cuneiform-records-review-by-alberto-bazzurro.php http://italia.allaboutjazz.com/wadada-leo-smith-americas-national-parks/ Par Thierry Giard (fr) http://www.culturejazz.fr/spip.php?article3003#wls Por Héctor Martín (es) http://www.cancionaquemarropa.es/2016/11/americas-national-parks-wadada-leo-smith/ Por Sergio Piccirilli (es) http://elintruso.com/2016/12/21/wadada-leo-smith-americas-national-parks/
